Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to the improvement and operation of sober living homes
Summary: Relates to the improvement and operation of sober living homes including the process for certification, inspections, and violations and the establishment of a toll free hotline to respond to complaints.
LawCode: Ren §390-e to be §390-f, add §390-g, Gen Bus L; add Art 21 §§21.01 - 21.19, Ment Hyg L; amd §§17 & 143-b, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, the mental hygiene law and the social services law, in relation to the improvement and operation of sober living homes
